snippet: A federal appeals court refused Thursday to release videotapes of the trial challenging the constitutionality of California’s same-sex marriage ban.
lead_paragraph: A federal appeals court refused Thursday to release videotapes of the trial challenging the constitutionality of California’s same-sex marriage ban.

headline.main: California: Reversal on Same-Sex Marriage Trial Tapes
headline.print_headline: California: Reversal On Same-Sex Marriage Trial Tapes

keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
